attributes.action: have Sir Fred Goodwin's knighthood revoked
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sir Fred Goodwin was knighted in the Queen's 2004 Birthday Honours list, for his services to banking.

It is now evident that his leadership was self-serving and his refusal to relinquish his rights to a pension of obscene value shows that he is without personal integrity.

Is this the type of person who should be a Knight of the Realm?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
